entity.description: US Secretary of Commerce Wilbur Ross

text: @GOP @SecretaryRoss At what cost to human life,Infestions are on the increase while this man is obsessed with his economy,allow me to ease your concerns. Mr Trump are you being honest with yourself people are dying from COVID-19 and your narrow mind is fixed on the economy,sad !
